text: (Kumbuchilani) katema kawawechete wankwao Imrani (wali mamawao Maryam jwali mamagwe Isa) kuti: “Ambuje wangu! Chisimu une nantawiile nasili janti; (mwanache) jwali nchitumbo changuchi chachiwa pepesa (lyakutumichila kunsikiti wa Baitul Muqaddas) basi mbochelani (nasili janguji), chisimu Mmwejo niwan'di Wakupikanichisya, Wakumanyilila nnope.”
